summary: Imperial and Storm Cloak Armor Rebalance
descriptionHtml:
It has always botherd me that the Imperial and Stormcloak armors where worse than the normal armors in the game. This mod aims to change that it edits the Imperial and stormcloak armors to match normal armor sets.

Imperial Heavy is now equal to Steel

Imperial Shield is now equal to Steel

Imperial Light is now equal to Leather

Stormcloak Armor is now equal to Leather

Stormcloak Helmet is now equal to Leather

If anybody has any requests for rebalances just let me know and I will do my best to make it happen.
author: Jonathan Rindahl
